channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Unica

item.title: CVE-2021-27777|2024-08-03T21:26:10.882Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica
item.description: XML External Entity (XXE) injection vulnerabilities occur when poorly configured XML parsers process user supplied input without sufficient validation. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to manipulate XML content and inject malicious external entity references.
